title: Theme
desc: You can download more themes in Karaokivy website

title: Font family
desc: The font used for the lyrics

title: Background type
desc: The type of the background shown behind the lyrics

title: Background image
desc: When the background type is set to "Image", this image will be used as a background.

title: Fullscreen
desc: Needs restart. May not work with more that one monitor.

title: Background color
desc: The color used behind the text

title: Sung lyrics color
desc: The color of the words you have already sung

title: To sing lyrics color
desc: The color of the words that you haven't sung yet
